endpoints.name: Get an ordered list of all of the search groups available to the current user
Search group[s] with a keyword-based query

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Groups
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of ids of the groups to search within (default searches all groups)

queryParameters.name: Sysparm search
queryParameters.description: The keyword(s) to search fo

queryParameters.name: Sysparm uuid
queryParameters.description: the scope of the scorecard or list of breakdown scorecards, or a comma-separated list of scopes

queryParameters.name: Sysparm BreakDown
queryParameters.description: sys_id of the breakdown for a list of breakdown scorecards

queryParameters.name: Sysparm BreakDown Relation
queryParameters.description: sys_id of the breakdown relation for a list of related breakdown scorecards

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Elements Filter
queryParameters.description: sys_id of the elements filter to be applied to the list of breakdown scorecards

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Display
queryParameters.description: true/false to return scorecards whose indicators have 'Publish on Scorecards' checked resp. unchecked, 'all' to ignore the value of 'Publish on Scorecards', default to true

queryParameters.name: Sysparm favorites
queryParameters.description: true to return only scorecards that are the user's favorite

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Key
queryParameters.description: true to return only scorecards of Key indicators

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Target
queryParameters.description: true to return only scorecards that have a target

queryParameters.name: Sysparm contains
queryParameters.description: matches scorecards by name or description, use comma separated list of strings

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Tags
queryParameters.description: matches scorecards by tag sysids, use comma separated list of sysids

queryParameters.name: Sysparm sortby
queryParameters.description: field to sort by, one of VALUE, CHANGE, CHANGEPERC, GAP, GAPPERC, NAME, ORDER, DEFAULT, INDICATOR_GROUP, FREQUENCY, TARGET, DATE, DIRECTION

queryParameters.name: Sysparm sortDir
queryParameters.description: use value ASC to sort in ascending order, use DESC to sort in descending order

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Display value
queryParameters.description: true/false to return display value or reference field, or 'all' to return both, defaults to all

queryParameters.name: Sysparm exclude reference_link
queryParameters.description: true to not return Link Information for Reference Fields

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Include Scores
queryParameters.description: true to include scores for each scorecard, requires the presence of sysparm_uuid

queryParameters.name: Sysparm From
queryParameters.description: start date in ISO-8601 format for which to return scores

queryParameters.name: Sysparm TO
queryParameters.description: end date in ISO-8601 format for which to return scores

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Step
queryParameters.description: positive integer indicating the gap between score dates, default to 1

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Limit
queryParameters.description: maximum number of scores to return, -1 means to return all scores, default to -1

queryParameters.name: Sysparm include available breakdowns
queryParameters.description: true to include all available breakdowns for a scorecard

queryParameters.name: Sysparm include available Aggregates
queryParameters.description: true to include all available aggregates for a scorecard

queryParameters.name: Sysparm include target color_scheme
queryParameters.description: true to include the target color scheme

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Inclide Realtime
queryParameters.description: true to include the realtime score

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Inclide Forecast Scores
queryParameters.description: true to include the forecast scores

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Inclide Trendline Scores
queryParameters.description: true to include the trendline scores

queryParameters.name: Sysparm operator
queryParameters.description: The query operator

queryParameters.name: Sysparm field
queryParameters.description: The name for the field/column to be queried

queryParameters.name: Sysparm sys_id
queryParameters.description: The sys_id of the record selected

queryParameters.name: Sysparm table
queryParameters.description: Table name

queryParameters.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false)

endpoints.name: Get a Predictive Intelligence Specific Solution

pathParameters.name: Solution Name
pathParameters.placeholder: Name of solution to use for predictions. For example, ml_incident_categorization.

queryParameters.name: Input filter
queryParameters.description: Required parameter if input_table is used, do not use this parameter with input_maps parameter. Filter to select records on which to run predictions.

queryParameters.name: Input Maps
queryParameters.description: Required unless using input_table parameter. Array of input name-value pairs. Data type: Array

queryParameters.name: Input table
queryParameters.description: Required unless using input_maps parameter. Table name on which you want to run predictions.

queryParameters.name: options
queryParameters.description: JSON object with optional arguments.

queryParameters.name: Solution names
queryParameters.description: Required. Comma-separated list of solution names for which you want to run predictions.

endpoints.name: GET list of knowledge base (KB) articles

queryParameters.name: filter
queryParameters.description: Syntax: filter=<Name of the table column><operator><value>. Default: empty

queryParameters.name: fields
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields from the Knowledge [kb_knowledge] table to show details in results.

queryParameters.name: kb
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of knowledge base sys_ids from the Knowledge Bases [kb_knowledge_base] table to restrict results to.

queryParameters.name: language
queryParameters.description: List of comma-separated languages in two-letter ISO 639-1 language code format to restrict results to. Alternatively type 'all' to search in all valid installed languages on an instance. Default: User's session language or en

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Default: 30

queryParameters.name: offset
queryParameters.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Default: 0

queryParameters.name: query
queryParameters.description: Text to search for, can be empty.

queryParameters.name: fields
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields from the Knowledge [kb_knowledge] table to show details in results.

queryParameters.name: limit

queryParameters.name: offset

queryParameters.name: language
queryParameters.description: Two letter ISO 639-1 language code; for example, 'fr' for French. Note: Only valid when setting the id parameter as a KB number (not sys_id).

queryParameters.name: search ID
queryParameters.description: Unique identifier of search that returned this article.

queryParameters.name: search rank
queryParameters.description: Article search rank by click-rate that you can retrieve using one of the following APIs that returns the articles.

queryParameters.name: Update View
queryParameters.description: Update view count and record an entry for the article in the Knowledge Use [kb_use] table. Note: If you pass update_view with search_id and search_rank, update_view is ignored because the view count will already be incremented. Boolean that is always handled as true when passed whether set to 'true', 'false', or not set at all.

queryParameters.name: fields
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields from the Knowledge [kb_knowledge] table to show details in results.

queryParameters.name: language

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Default: 30

queryParameters.name: offset
queryParameters.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Default: 0

queryParameters.description:
Data retrieval operation for reference and choice fields. 
Valid values:true: Returns the display values for all fields.
 false: Returns the actual values from the database. 
 all: Returns both actual and display values

queryParameters.name: Sysparm Offset

queryParameters.description: Return all configuration records created before the specified date and time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

endpoints.name: Get employee profile in the United States

queryParameters.name: Employee identifier
queryParameters.description: Unique identifier of an employee. Note: This parameter is mutually exclusive with the updated_after parameter. This parameter defines a unique employee, whereas updated_after returns a group of employees created/updated after a specified date.

queryParameters.name: Sysparm limit
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Default: 100,000.

queryParameters.name: Sysparm offset
queryParameters.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records.

queryParameters.name: Updated after
queryParameters.description: updated on or after this date, are included in the return results. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS or YYYY-MM-DD (time defaults to 00:00:00)

queryParameters.description: Name of the branch associated with the orchestration task. Note: You should provide this parameter when referencing multi-branch pipelines or the response may include incorrect change details.

queryParameters.name: Build number
queryParameters.description: Pipeline build number within the orchestration tool.

queryParameters.name: Pipeline name
queryParameters.description: Optional for Jenkins Freestyle or Maven projects, required for all others. Orchestration pipeline name.

queryParameters.name: Project name
queryParameters.description: Required for Jenkins Freestyle or Maven projects, optional for all others. Orchestration tool project name.

queryParameters.name: Stage name
queryParameters.description: Optional for Jenkins Freestyle or Maven projects, required for all others. Orchestration stage name. Maximum length: 160

queryParameters.name: Tool ID
queryParameters.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool. Located in the Orchestration Tool [sn_devops_orchestration_tool] table.

endpoints.name: Get specified time series data from MetricBase database

queryParameters.name: sysparm_display_value
queryParameters.description: Flag that indicates whether to label the result data with the subject record display value if no other label is specified.

queryParameters.name: sysparm_end
queryParameters.description: End time of the evaluation period. An empty or missing value is treated as the current time. Absolute date format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss], such as 2019-03-20T17:04:55.

queryParameters.name: sysparm_start
queryParameters.description: Start time of the evaluation period. The special value all can be used to set the start time as the current time minus the maximum retention period for the specified metrics. An empty or missing value is treated as an implicit all. Absolute date format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss], such as 2019-03-20T17:04:55.

queryParameters.description: End time of the evaluation period. An empty or missing value is treated as the current time. Absolute date format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss], such as 2019-03-20T17:04:55.

queryParameters.name: sysparm_start
queryParameters.description: Start time of the evaluation period. The special value all can be used to set the start time as the current time minus the maximum retention period for the specified metrics. An empty or missing value is treated as an implicit all. Absolute date format [YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss], such as 2019-03-20T17:04:55.

queryParameters.name: sysparm_query
queryParameters.description: Encoded query string for finding the subject records.

queryParameters.name: sysparm_subject_limit
queryParameters.description: Limit size of the subject query result. Default: 10,000

queryParameters.name: sysparm_transforms
queryParameters.description: Comma separated list of transforms. Valid transforms: add, avg, label, mul, resample, sum, top

sampleData.subject: Contract threshold has been breached for contract CNTR0009087
sampleData.text:
Asset Manager,
 The contract CNTR0009087 has breached the threshold expiration level of 'Within 60 days'
 Please take corrective action as soon as possible

Unsubscribe [mailto:dev57375@servicenowdevelopers.com?subject=Unsubscribe from "Contract Threshold breached"&body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification "Contract Threshold breached"%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{"id":"9927623137132000158bbfc8bcbe5d90","token":"c797e62132"}] | Notification Preferences [https://dev57375.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=9927623137132000158bbfc8bcbe5d90]

Ref:MSG0000207_ZBmK9TQv8BC69iG4clEu
